question: Will Trzaskowski or Nawrocki win the diaspora vote?
description:
This market will resolve to "Trzaskowski" if Rafał Trzaskowski receives more total votes than Karol Nawrocki from Polish citizens voting abroad (diaspora) in the second round of the 2025 Polish presidential election.
It will resolve to "Nawrocki" if Karol Nawrocki receives more total diaspora votes than Rafał Trzaskowski.
If votes cast within Wrocław are exactly equal for each candidate, this market will resolve 50-50.

Only votes cast outside Poland (i.e., at polling stations abroad and on Polish-flagged ships) will count for the purposes of this market. The resolution will be based on the official results published by Poland’s National Electoral Commission (Państwowa Komisja Wyborcza, PKW), specifically the results for voters abroad.

If the diaspora results are not published or are contested, this market will remain open until the final official totals from abroad are confirmed by a ruling from the Supreme Court and published in the Journal of Laws (Dziennik Ustaw).

Official results can be found at: https://wybory.gov.pl/prezydent2025/en/wynik/pow/149900

question: Europa League Final
description:
The market will resolve to "Tottenham" if Tottenham wins the 2025 Europa League Final.

The market will resolve to "Manchester United" if Manchester United wins the 2025 Europa League Final.

If the Europa League Final has not been completed by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "50-50". 

The resolution source for this market will be Europa League (https://www.uefa.com/uefaeuropaleague/).

question: Israel strike on Iranian nuclear facility in May?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel carries out a kinetic military action against any Iranian facility used for the development, enrichment, storage, or processing of nuclear material or technology, including reactors, enrichment facilities, uranium mines, and research centers located on Iranian soil, between May 20, 10:00 PM ET, and May 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

This includes, but is not limited to drone and missile strikes, aerial bombings, and kinetic actions carried out by Israeli operatives on the ground. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Israeli missile and drone strikes which are shot down or miss their targets will not be considered for this market.

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.

Note: Cyber attacks will not qualify, even if they have kinetic effects.

question: Rangers vs. Yankees
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for May 22 at 12:35PM ET:
If the Texas Rangers win, the market will resolve to “Rangers”.
If the New York Yankees win, the market will resolve to “Yankees”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Ethereum Up or Down on May 23?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETHUSDT 22 May '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 23 May '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETHUSDT 22 May '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 23 May '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETHUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETHUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be greater than $110K on May 22 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 22 May '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Trump say "Enemy" 5+ times during West Point Commencement on May 24?
description:
Donald Trump is scheduled to graduation address at West Point Academy on May 24. You can read more about that here: https://www.recordonline.com/story/news/2025/04/22/trump-to-deliver-commencement-at-2025-west-point-graduation/83213049007/.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump says the listed term during his appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Instances where the term is used in a compound word will count regardless of context (e.g. joyful is not a compound word for "joy," however "killjoy" is a compounding of the words "kill" and "joy").

If this event is definitively cancelled, or otherwise is not aired by May 25, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

This market is explicitly about the main speech Trump gives at the named event. Speeches, events, or comments that occur outside of this event will not qualify toward this market's resolution. If the event contains a Q&A, it will count toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source will be video of the events.

This market is explicitly about the main speech Trump gives at the named event. Speeches, events, or comments that occur outside of this event will not qualify toward this market's resolution. If the event contains a Q&A, it will count toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source will be video of the events.

description:
The 78th Tony Awards are scheduled to be held on June 8, 2025, to recognize outstanding achievements in Broadway productions during the 2024–25 season. You can read more about that here: https://www.tonyawards.com/nominees/

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Tony Awards, including data from their website (e.g. https://www.tonyawards.com/nominees/) and the live broadcast of the award ceremony, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
